QuestData.Title: A Proper Poultice
QuestData.Description: A dry bandage doesn't do much good, other than maybe keeping bugs out of the wound. In some camps, that's the best you can hope for.$b$bNot in my camp, though.$b$bI prefer to make a paste from whatever soothing herbs I can find, and layer that between bandages. The most soothing herbs I've been able to find in the field are the Mao-Willows from the fields in the northeast. If you run into any, bring them back.
QuestData.RewardText: These will do.$b$bThe Shado-Pan appreciates your work, $n.
